Verses: 1 karththar Moseyai Nokki:
2 naan Isravel Puththirarukkuk Kodukkum Kaanaandhesaththai Sutrippaarppadharku Nee Manidharai Anuppu; Ovvoru Pidhaakkalin Koththiraththilum Ovvoru Prabuvaagiya Purushanai Anuppavendum Endraar.
3 mose Karththarudaiya Vaakkinpadiye Avargalaip Paaraan Vanaandharaththalirundhu Anuppinaan; Andha Manidhar Yaavarum Isravel Puththirarin Thalaivargal.
4 avargaludaiya Naamangalaavana: Rooban Koththiraththil Sakkoorin Kumaaran Sammuvaa.
5 simiyon Koththiraththil Oriyin Kumaaran Saappaadh.
6 yoodhaa Koththiraththil Eppunneyin Kumaaran Kaalep.
7 isakkaar Koththiraththil Yoseppin Kumaaran Eekaal.
8 eppraayeem Koththiraththil Noonin Kumaaran Oseyaa.
9 benyameen Koththiraththil Rappoovin Kumaaran Palththi.
10 sepulon Koththiraththil Sodhiyin Kumaaran Kaadhiyel.
11 yoseppin Koththiraththai Serndha Manaase Koththiraththil Soosin Kumaaran Kaadhi.
12 thaan Koththiraththil Kemalliyin Kumaaran Ammiyel.
13 aaser Koththiraththil Migaavelin Kumaaran Seththoor.
14 napthali Koththiraththil Oppesiyin Kumaaran Naagapi.
15 kaadh Koththiraththil Maakiyin Kumaaran Koovel.
16 dhesaththai Sutrippaarkkumpadi Mose Anuppina Manidharin Naamangal Ivaigale; Noonin Kumaaranaagiya Oseyaavukku Yosuvaa Endru Mose Perittirundhaan.
17 avargalai Mose Kaanaandhesaththai Sutrippaarkkumpadi Anuppugaiyil, Avargalai Nokki: Neengal Ippadith Therke Poi, Malaiyil Eri,
18 dhesam Eppadippattadhendrum, Kudiyirukkira Janangal Balavaangalo Balaveenargalo, Konjampero Anegampero Endrum,

19 avargal Kudiyirukkira Dhesam Eppadippattadhu, Adhu Nalladho Kettadho Endrum, Avargal Pattanangal Eppadippattadhendrum, Avargal Koodaarangalil Kudiyirukkiravargalo Kottaigalil Kudiyirukkiravargalo Endrum,

20 nilam Eppadippattadhu, Adhu Valappamaanadho Ilappamaanadho Endrum, Adhil Virutchangal Undo Illaiyo Endrum Paarungal, Dhairiyankondirundhu, Dhesaththin Kanigalile Silavatraik Konduvaarungal Endraan. Akkaalam Dhraatchachchedi Mudharpazham Pazhukkira Kaalamaayirundhadhu.
21 avargal Poi, Seen Vanaandharanthodangi, Aamaaththukkup Pogira Vazhiyaagiya Rekopmattum, Dhesaththai Sutrippaarththu,
22 therkeyum Sendru, Epironmattum Ponaargal; Ange Enaakkin Kumaararaagiya Akeemaanum Sesaayum Thalmaayum Irundhaargal. Epiron Egipthilulla Sovaanukku Ezhuvarushaththirkumunne Kattappattadhu.

23 pinbu, Avargal Eskol Pallaththaakkumattum Poi, Ange Ore Kulaiyulla Dhraatchakkodiyai Aruththaargal; Adhai Oru Thadiyile Iranduper Kattith Thookkikkonduvandhaargal: Maadhalampazhangalilum Aththippazhangalilum Silavatraik Konduvandhaargal.
24 isravel Puththirar Ange Aruththa Dhraatchakkulaiyinimiththam, Avvidam Eskol Pallaththaakku Ennappattadhu.
25 avargal Dhesaththai Sutrippaarththu, Naarpadhunaal Sendrapinbu Thirumbinaargal.

26 avargal Baaraan Vanaandharaththil Irukkira Kaadhesukku Vandhu, Mose Aaron Enbavargalidaththilum Isravel Puththiraraagiya Sabaiyaar Ellaaridaththilum Serndhu, Avargalukkum Sabaiyaaranaivarukkum Samaachaaraththai Ariviththu, Dhesaththin Kanigalai Avargalukkuk Kaanbiththaargal.
27 avargal Moseyai Nokki: Neer Engalai Anuppina Dhesaththukku Naangal Poivandhom; Adhu Paalum Thenum Odugira Dhesandhaan; Idhu Adhinudaiya Kani.
28 aanaalum, Andha Dhesaththile Kudiyirukkira Janangal Balavaangal; Pattanangal Aranippaanavaigalum Migavum Periyavaigalumaai Irukkiradhu; Ange Enaakkin Kumaararaiyum Kandom.

29 amalekkiyar Thenpuramaana Dhesaththil Kudiyirukkiraargal; Eththiyarum, Epoosiyarum, Emoriyarum Malainaattil Kudiyirukkiraargal; Kaanaaniyar Kadal Arugeyum Yordhaanandaiyilum Kudiyirukkiraargal Endraargal.
30 appozhudhu Kaalep Mosekku Munbaaga Janangalai Amarththi: Naam Udane Poi Adhai Sudhandhariththukkolvom; Naam Adhai Elidhaai Jeyiththukkollalaam Endraan.
31 avanodekoodap Poivandha Manidharo: Naam Poi Andha Janangalode Edhirkka Nammaale Koodaadhu; Avargal Nammaippaarkkilum Balavaangal Endraargal.
32 naangal Poi Sutrip Paarththuvandha Andha Dhesam Than Kudigalaip Patchikkira Dhesam; Naangal Adhile Kanda Janangal Ellaarum Migavum Periya Aatkal.

33 ange Raatchadhap Piraviyaana Enaakkin Kumaararaagiya Raatchadharaiyum Kandom; Naangal Engal Paarvaikku Vettukkiligalaippol Irundhom, Avargal Paarvaikkum Appadiye Irundhom Endru Solli, Ippadi Isravel Puththirarukkulle Thaangal Sutrippaarththuvandha Dhesaththaikkuriththu Dhurchcheydhi Parambachcheydhaargal.
